title: Salsa Chicken Recipe
description: This salsa chicken recipe combines taco-seasoned chicken breasts with salsa topped with melted cheese, quickly baked in the oven in just 30 minutes.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Global Cuisines Latin American Mexican Salsa Chicken 4.6 (4,750) 3,318 Reviews 511 Photos This salsa chicken recipe is very easy and quick! Someone gave me this recipe a few years back, and it has become a household favorite. Depending on your taste, you can use mild, medium, or hot salsa. I usually serve it with Spanish rice and Mexican-style canned corn. Submitted by Faye Updated on April 3, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 511 511 511 511 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 35 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves 4 teaspoons taco seasoning mix 1 cup salsa 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese 2 tablespoons sour cream (Optional) Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place chicken breasts in the prepared dish. Sprinkle seasoning mix on both sides of chicken breasts. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pour salsa on top. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is tender and juicy and the juices run clear, 25 to 35 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Sprinkle chicken evenly with cheese. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Continue baking until cheese is melted and bubbly, 3 to 5 minutes more. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Top with sour cream and serve. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 6,905 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 287 Calories 12g Fat 7g Carbs 36g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 287 % Daily Value * Total Fat 12g 16% Saturated Fat 7g 37% Cholesterol 101mg 34% Sodium 863mg 38% Total Carbohydrate 7g 2% Dietary Fiber 1g 4% Total Sugars 3g Protein 36g 71% Vitamin C 3mg 3% Calcium 243mg 19% Iron 1mg 7% Potassium 531mg 11% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Salsa Chicken 01 of 511 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 511 Photo by  OHSUSAN429 09/18/2022 This dish was actually way better than I thought it would be! The only changes that I made was using pineapple salsa and then garnishing with fresh cilantro, green onions fresh squeezed lime and tortilla strips after it came out of the oven. Served over yellow rice. I will absolutely be making this again. The whole family liked it. 03 of 511 Photo by  ArtsyStove4178 05/21/2022 04 of 511 Photo by  may lorena 01/28/2022 This is a delicious, fast and easy recipe. It’s perfect for a quick weekday meal. I cut my chicken up into pieces and paired it with white rice and roasted broccoli. My kids loved it and asked for seconds! I didn’t make any changes to the recipe. 05 of 511 Photo by  Laura Lucey 09/01/2021 I used the top commenter’s edits with Rotel as a base to keep the chicken moist while cooking. I would have added the salsa first then the taco seasoning because the seasoning slid off the chicken (on the top) as soon as the salsa fell on it so I ended up adding more taco seasoning than it called for but it was still good! Chicken came out moist and husband very happy! 06 of 511 Photo by  Darrell Alexander 08/12/2021 07 of 511 Photo by  Debbie 05/01/2021 08 of 511 Photo by  Collette Loya 04/23/2021 09 of 511 Photo by  Steven Kearney 04/03/2021 10 of 511 Photo by  Chef Randall 02/04/2021 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos 178 Ratings Spanish Rice Chicken I 56 Ratings Spicy Shredded Chicken Tinga 7 Ratings Sarah's Easy Shredded Chicken Taco Filling 133 Ratings "Pantry Raid" Chicken Enchilada Casserole 525 Ratings Mexican Casserole 1,098 Ratings Salsa Chicken Burrito Filling 907 Ratings Spicy Chicken and Black Bean Bake 9 Ratings Keto Chicken Taco Shells 9 Ratings Taco Macaroni Skillet 8 Ratings Spicy Fish Tacos with Fresh Lime Sauce 68 Ratings Sour Cream Chicken Enchiladas 663 Ratings Quick and Easy Mexican Chicken 900 Ratings Chicken Fajita Melts 392 Ratings Spicy Southwest Chicken Casserole 50 Ratings Cinnamon Chicken 111 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
